aiotbotania.hoeMode: Till soil und create grass paths
botania.page.livingwoodTools0:
§1Livingwood§0 can be shaped into tools by AIOT Botania.
The tools have properties like §1Wood§0, albeit somewhat superior in enchantability and durability. Whenever a §1Livingwood§0 item is to take damage, if there's &4Mana§0 available in the inventory (such as a §1Mana Tablet§0), it'll use that instead.
Apart from the damage, they're like the vanilla tools.
botania.page.livingrockTools0:
§1Livingrock§0 can be shaped into tools by AIOT Botania.
The tools have properties like §1Stone§0, albeit somewhat superior in enchantability, durability and a few tweaks. Whenever a §1Livingrock§0 item is to take damage, if there's &4Mana§0 available in the inventory (such as a §1Mana Tablet§0), it'll use that instead.
The tools are like improved vanilla tools.
botania.page.manaGear11:
Because &2AIOT Botania§0 is installed there are two more items. The §1Hoe§0 is just like a normal vanilla Hoe but uses &4Mana§0 like the other tools.
The §1AIOT§0 is like a fusion out of §1Manasteel Sword§0, §1Pickaxe§0, §1Axe§0, §1Shovel§0 and §1Hoe§0 and combines all of their features.
botania.page.elfGear10: The §1Elementium Sword§0 will increase the chance of a &4Pixie§0 spawning when hit (this holds true when no §1Elementium Armor§0 is worn) and increases the strength of any &4Pixies§0 spawned.
botania.page.elfGear16: The §1Elementium Hoe§0 tills a dirt block or something simular into a farmland block which doesn't break by jumping on it. With this farmland you don't need water nearby, the block is wet everytime. When right-clicking on farmland the farmland converts back to dirt.
botania.page.elfGear18:
Lastly, the §1Elementium AIOT§0 fusions all the special effects of the other §1Elementium§0 tools.
Because you can place &4saplings§0 and &4torches§0 with axe and pickaxe, there is a mode which can be toggled by &4shift-right clicking§0. One mode is for tilling and create grass paths, the other mode is for placing saplings and torches.
